Articles.Content:
Gets 50 Ib's of sugar

Inserts 50 Ib's of sugar

Receives a disk containing the complete Starbound soundtrack.

Inserts a cutting of *Crassula ovata* (common jade plant), etched with a sigil of accelerated propagation.

Gets a dead plant.

Inserts the entire planet of Europa!

*While we're on the topic, how big is this coin slot?*

Gets out a page with two definitions, one for planet, one for moon.

Inserts the Oort cloud.

erm... I really do not know. Big, I guess. Really, really big?

Gets a fart that sounds like "Oort."

Inserts a computer monitor.

Get a 2-lightyear-wide coin slot.

Bend the coin slot into itself (In other words, insert the coin slot itself).

You fail to bend the coin slot into itself for two reasons: one, this doesn't make any geometric sense, and two, the coin slot is part of the Immutable Framework of the thread, and is thus indestructible.

The machine gives you a deploring look, and dispenses a bill worth -50 USD.

I insert a single Planck-wavelength photon.

Gets no coins

Inserts a greening galaxy

(Sorry just have to do it!)

Gets a reding galaxy

Inserts Jeb.

gets the apocalypse.

inserts overfloater.

i think the coin slot is as big as the universe

> 
> Inserts the entire planet of Europa!

> 
> Gets out a page with two definitions, one for planet, one for moon.

Oh god, I'm an idiot. What I just did was an extreme sin, on the KSP forums ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

Anyways... gets a rubber ducky.

Inserts a suspicious red candle.

Get a suspicous cake that might be some kind of lie.

Insert bill worth -50 USD.

gets bill worth 5 usd

inserts lie

Gets shunned.

Insert Space Engine.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-06T15:48:54Z" title="03/06/2015 03:48  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 6, 2015</time> by Thomas988**
  
Ninja'd

Gets my new computer.

Insert invisi-text.

Get awesomenothing put in

put in master hand

gets slave hand

inserts big red button

BOOM!!!!!!

Puts in crater!

Receives Moho!

-Inserts cell phone-

Gets electronic parts.

Inserts this hot thread! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Gets a moderator lock. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Inserts charging cable.

Gets outlet,

Inserts car battery...

Gets a politician (they're quite similar to hydrochloric acid)

Inserts a vending machine.

Gets the world record speedrun on Ninja Gaiden.

Inserts skillz.

gets noobz.

inserts universe....
